document_data.name: ''Earring of Protection''
document_data.mainbody: An '''''earring of protection''''' was an [[enchanted]] piece of jewelry that guarded against physical attacks.
document_data.Powers: These items helped protect the wearer from physical attacks as well as giving them a better chance of resisting the effects of harmful [[spell]]s, poisons, etc. Their beneficial effects would combine with similar items that magically protected the wearer.
document_data.Notable Owners:
* [[Emirikol]], a [[plane]]-traveling [[wizard]], wore an ''earring of protection.''
* [[Ongamar Tathloon]] wore a golden ''+3 earring of protection''.<ref>
